id.comment: Follows* Query for all Read Statements

query.querystr: procedure p; Select p such that Follows*(1, 2)

id.comment: Follows* Query for all Read Statements

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Follows*(3, 27)

id.comment: Follows* Query for all Read Statements

query.querystr: constant c; Select c such that Follows*(5, 35)

id.comment: Follows* Query for all Read Statements

query.querystr: read r; Select r such that Follows*(19, 25)

id.comment: Follows* Query that is False

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Follows*(2, 6)

id.comment: Invalid Follows* Query due to wrong order

query.querystr: print pn; Select pn such that Follows*(2, 1)

id.comment: Invalid Follows* Query where statement number is out of range

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs such that Follows*(35, 37)

id.comment: Invalid Follows* Query where statement number is not in range

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Follows*(0, 3)

id.comment: Invalid Follows* Query

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows*(31, 33)

id.comment: Valid Follows* Query where Follows*(s, #) (EMPTY RESULT as stmt 6 is the start of new if block)

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows*(s, 6)

id.comment: Valid Follows* Query where Follows*(#, s)

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows*(1, s)

id.comment: Valid Follows* Query where Follows*(s, #) (EMPTY RESULT as stmt 8 is the start of new while block)

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows*(s, 8)

id.comment: Valid Follows* Query where Follows*(#, s) where # is a while statement

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows*(19, s)

id.comment: Valid Follows* Query where Follows*(#, s) where # is a if statement

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows*(30, s)

id.comment: Valid Follows* Query where Follows*(#, 27) where # is a if statement

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows*(s, 27)

id.comment: Invalid Follows* Query where Follows*(#, s) as # is the last statement

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows*(36, s)

id.comment: Invalid Follows* Query where Follows*(s, 1)

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows*(s, 1)

id.comment: Invalid Follows* Query where Follows*(7, s) as line 7 is end of if block

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows*(7, s)

id.comment: Invalid Follows* Query where Follows*(s, 18) as line 18 is start of else block

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Follows*(s, 18)

id.comment: Valid Follows* Query where Follows*(r, a)

query.querystr: read r; assign a; Select r such that Follows*(r, a)

id.comment: Valid Follows* Query where Follows*(a, r) (EMPTY RESULT)

query.querystr: read r; assign a; Select a such that Follows*(a, r)

id.comment: Valid Follows* Query where Follows*(a, pn)

query.querystr: print pn; assign a; Select a such that Follows*(a, pn)

id.comment: Valid Follows* Query where Follows*(pn, a)

query.querystr: print pn; assign a; Select pn such that Follows*(pn, a)

id.comment: Valid Follows* Query where Follows*(a, if)

query.querystr: if ifs; assign a; Select ifs such that Follows*(a, ifs)

id.comment: Valid Follows* Query where Follows*(a, w)

query.querystr: while w; assign a; Select a such that Follows*(a, w)

id.comment: Valid Follows* Query where Follows*(w, s)

query.querystr: while w; stmt s; Select s such that Follows*(w, s)

id.comment: Valid Follows* Query where Follows*(a1, a2)

query.querystr: assign a1, a2; Select a1 such that Follows*(a1, a2)

id.comment: Valid Follows* Query where Follows*(w1, w2) (EMPTY RESULT)

query.querystr: while w1, w2; Select w2 such that Follows*(w1, w2)

id.comment: Valid Follows* Query where Follows*(if1, if2) (EMPTY RESULT)

query.querystr: if if1, if2; Select if1 such that Follows*(if1, if2)

id.comment: Valid Follows* Query where Follows*(w, ifs) (EMPTY RESULT)

query.querystr: if ifs; while w; Select w such that Follows*(w, ifs)

id.comment: Valid Follows* Query where Follows*(ifs, w)

query.querystr: if ifs; while w; Select w such that Follows*(ifs, w)

id.comment: Valid Follows* Query where Follows*(_, _)

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Follows*(_, _)

id.comment: Valid Follows* Query where Follows*(w, _)

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Follows*(w, _)

id.comment: Valid Follows* Query where Follows*(_, a)

query.querystr: assign a; Select a such that Follows*(_, a)

id.comment: Valid Follows* Query where Follows*(6, _) evaluates to True

query.querystr: read r; Select r such that Follows*(6, _)

id.comment: Follows* Query where Follows*(36, _) evaluates to False (EMPTY RESULT)

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Follows*(36, _)

id.comment: Invalid Follows* Query with Syntax error

query.querystr: stmt s; while w; if ifs; Select x such that Follows*(6, _)
query.exception: Bad PQL Query. The target synonym is NOT declared

id.comment: Invalid Follows* Query with Syntax error

query.querystr: stmt s; while w; if ifs; Select s such that Follows*(6, x)
query.exception: BAD PQL Query. Some synonyms in the such-that clauses were NOT declared
